description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Retro Arcade Adventure is an arcade styled game with retro graphics.  It is reminiscent of a "one against many" game with fantasy game typical influences like swords, dragons and potions. During his battle the Player can use the magical powers of orbs in order to strengthen his sword, to heal himself, or to even turn into a fire-breathing dragon.
